tests.name: Case 1 Request
tests.run: ./server | grep "Server received" > test-files/out.txt & ./client Gabriel 6 7; head -n 1 test-files/out.txt > test-files/tmp1.txt; head -n 1 test-files/test_1.txt > test-files/tmp2.txt; diff test-files/tmp1.txt test-files/tmp2.txt

tests.name: Case 1 Reply
tests.run: ./server & ./client Gabriel 6 7 | grep "Client received" > test-files/out.txt; head -n 1 test-files/out.txt > test-files/tmp1.txt; head -n 1 test-files/test_2.txt > test-files/tmp2.txt; diff test-files/tmp1.txt test-files/tmp2.txt

tests.name: Case 2 Request
tests.run: ./server | grep "Server received" > test-files/out.txt & ./client "Test Subject" 4 1; head -n 1 test-files/out.txt > test-files/tmp1.txt; head -n 1 test-files/test_3.txt > test-files/tmp2.txt; diff test-files/tmp1.txt test-files/tmp2.txt

tests.name: Case 2 Reply
tests.run: ./server & ./client "Test Subject" 4 1 | grep "Client received" > test-files/out.txt; head -n 1 test-files/out.txt > test-files/tmp1.txt; head -n 1 test-files/test_4.txt > test-files/tmp2.txt; diff test-files/tmp1.txt test-files/tmp2.txt
